meanings.definition: The action of extending or stretching out.
meanings.sent1: The extension of the arm reached for the book on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The extension of the bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent3: The extension of the cat's paw made it look like it was trying to shake hands.
meanings.sent4: The extension of the tree branches created a canopy of shade.
meanings.sent5: The extension of the road seemed to lead to endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: A part that is added to something to enlarge or prolong it.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen extension provided more space for cooking and dining.
meanings.sent2: The file cabinet had an additional extension for extra storage.
meanings.sent3: The extension of the house made it look like a giant puzzle piece.
meanings.sent4: The extension of the garden added a new dimension to the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The extension of the table allowed more guests to be seated comfortably.

meanings.definition: A length of time allowed for payment of a debt or completion of a task.
meanings.sent1: The deadline extension gave the students more time to finish their project.
meanings.sent2: The contract included an extension for late payment without penalty.
meanings.sent3: The extension of the assignment deadline felt like a gift from the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The extension of the warranty period provided peace of mind for the buyer.
meanings.sent5: The extension of the lease agreement allowed the tenants to stay longer in the apartment.
